items.short_desc:
Here's what transpired in the last week of the Indian T20 League

- Bangalore's winning finish 🏁
- Warner's farewell 👋
- Rajasthan's young gem 🌟

items.short_desc: The controversies continued even in the last week of the group stage in the Indian Masala League.

Little pinch of jibe ✅ 

Voila! Indian Masala League is ready to be served! 🍲🍽
